alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 8:15PM CDT until March 14 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .The Ohio River will continue a slow fall, dropping below flood stage at Olmsted and Cairo early Tuesday morning. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 38.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 22.7 feet Wednesday, March 22. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. &&
